description.Armor_skill_bar: This is your skill tree; To start you will have a limit of 10000 energy with which to use armor, wearing it or using abilities will spend more energy, on the top screen you will see an icon which will change color depending on your energy (orange is when it's full); To unlock more armors you will have to keep using them and to recharge you will need to use a powered ark energy block
description.satsu.health: Receives a health increase with diferents armors
description.satsu.durability: Receives a durability increase with diferents armors
description.satsu.strength: Receives a strength increase with diferents armors
description.satsu.fall_resistance: You are quite resistant to falls
description.iron.man.mark.1: Your first armor, capable of flying and throwing flames (to put it on you need to create an armor placement block) Durability:2    Strength: 1
description.iron.man.mark.2: A stronger armor than the previous one with some improvements, more durability and plasma shots and an incredible energy beam (to put it on you need to create an armor placement block) Durability:3    Strength: 1    Flight Speed: 6
description.iron.man.mark.3: (to put it on you need to create an armor placement block) /Has flares/ Durability:5    Strength: 3    Flight Speed: 6
description.iron.man.mark.5: The mark 5 is a more resistant armor with more strength, and it fixes the flaw of not being able to fly at great heights, which you'll carry in a briefcase Durability:6    Strength: 4    Flight Speed: 6
description.iron.man.mark.6: Mark 6 is a successor to mark 5, with improvements in strength and durability plus you won't have to carry a briefcase but a sentinel accompanying you /Has flares/ Durability:1    Strength: 1    Flight Speed: 6
description.iron.man.mark.7: Mark 7 is a successor to mark 6, with improvements in strength and durability /Has flares/ Durability:7    Strength: 8    Flight Speed: 6
description.iron.man.mark.8: Mark 8 is a successor to mark 7, with improvements in strength and durability /Has flares/ Durability:7    Strength: 8    Flight Speed: 6
description.iron.man.mark.9: Mark 9 is the prototype of mark 10, which is an armor that slightly improves speed Durability:8    Strength: 8    Flight Speed: 6.15
description.iron.man.mark.10: Mark 10 is a successor to mark 9, compared to its prototype it has a considerable increase over its previous versions /Has flares/ Durability:9    Strength: 9    Flight Speed: 6.25
description.iron.man.mark.11: Mark 11 is a successor to mark 10, designed for stealth environments thanks to its invisibility system although it's not as strong as its predecessor but more resistant Durability:10    Strength: 6    Flight Speed: 6.15
description.iron.man.mark.12: Mark 12 is a successor to mark 11 /Has flares/ Durability:11    Strength: 9    Flight Speed: 6.15
description.iron.man.mark.13: Mark 13 is a successor to mark 12, It's a lighter model compared to its predecessors increasing flight speed, Instead of shooting plasma you have a minigun in hand, so your shots are faster /Has flares/ Durability:11    Strength: 9    Flight Speed: 6.35
description.iron.man.mark.14: Mark 14 is a successor to mark 13 Durability:12    Strength: 10    Flight Speed: 6.25
description.iron.man.mark.15: Mark 15 is a successor to mark 14, It has an active camouflage system for longer than the previous armor plus a sonic neutralization system /Has flares/ Durability:13    Strength: 10    Flight Speed: 6.25
description.iron.man.mark.Stealh: Mark 16 has an improved active camouflage system, although it's not as resistant or as strong as its predecessor, suitable for stealth missions Durability:11    Strength: 3    Flight Speed: 6.25
description.iron.man.mark.17: Mark 17 is a successor to mark 16; It has a better arc beam as well as an energy shield /Has flares/ Durability:14    Strength: 10    Flight Speed: 6.25
description.iron.man.mark.18: Mark 18 is a successor to mark 17; It has a better arc beam as well as an energy shield, while integrating the color and camouflage system of mark 16 (Nightclub), Instead of shooting plasma you have a minigun in hand, so your shots are faster /Has flares/ Durability:14    Strength: 11    Flight Speed: 6.25
description.iron.man.mark.19.tiger: Mark 19 is a model based purely on speed being a prototype of mark 20, having a considerable increase over others while having the ability to increase speed considerably for fast flights /Has flares/ Durability:13    Strength: 8    Flight Speed: 6.45
description.iron.man.mark.20: Mark 20 is the successor to mark 19, similarly it's a model based on speed having an increase in this, like its predecessor can increase flight speed /Has flares/ Durability:15    Strength: 12    Flight Speed: 6.55
description.iron.man.mark.21.midas: Mark 21 like its predecessor is a model based on speed /Has flares/ Durability:16    Strength: 6    Flight Speed: 6.65
description.iron.man.mark.22: Mark 22 is a successor to mark 21, with a peculiar design based on the hotrod car, It has miniguns on each forearm Durability:16    Strength: 12    Flight Speed: 6.45
description.iron.man.mark.23: Mark 23 is a successor to mark 22, with a peculiar design and the ability to become invisible like Nightclub or Sneaky /Has flares/ Durability:16    Strength: 12    Flight Speed: 6.45
description.iron.man.mark.24: Mark 24 is a successor to mark 23, with a design and weaponry of Heartbreaker or Casanova /Has flares/ Durability:17    Strength: 13    Flight Speed: 6.45
description.iron.man.mark.25: The Striker armor is the successor to mark 24, it has two large hammers that you can use to break the ground and mine faster /Has flares/ Durability:17    Strength: 13    Flight Speed: 6.45
description.iron.man.mark.26: The Gamma armor is the successor to mark 25, it has two large hammers that you can use to break the ground and mine faster /Has flares/ Durability:18    Strength: 13    Flight Speed: 6.45
description.iron.man.mark.27: The Disco armor is the successor to mark 26, It has a peculiar color pattern based on disco balls /Has flares/ Durability:18    Strength: 14    Flight Speed: 6.45
description.iron.man.mark.28: The Jack armor is the successor to mark 27, It has a peculiar color pattern based on disco balls like its predecessor Durability:19    Strength: 14    Flight Speed: 6.45
description.iron.man.mark.29: The Fiddler armor is the successor to mark 24, It has a pneumatic hammer like the previous Gamma and Striker armors, plus the repulsor shield and improvements from the Heartbreaker model series /Has flares/ Durability:20    Strength: 15    Flight Speed: 6.45
description.iron.man.mark.30: The Blue Steel armor is the first in the Silver Centurion model series, It has retractable vibranium daggers for close combat, Plus they are capable of mining /Has flares/ Durability:21    Strength: 16    Flight Speed: 6.45
description.iron.man.mark.31: The Piston armor is the second armor in the Silver Centurion series, it's made for flying quickly like other previous models based on speed /Has flares/ Durability:22    Strength: 17    Flight Speed: 6.75
description.iron.man.mark.32: The Romeo armor is the successor to the Fiddler armor, Maintains the basic abilities of a Heartbreaker plus having an increase in speed /Has flares/ Durability:23    Strength: 18    Flight Speed: 6.65
description.iron.man.mark.33: The Silver Centurion armor is the third armor in the Silver Centurion series, like Blue Steel it has retractable vibranium daggers capable of mining /Has flares/ Durability:23    Strength: 18    Flight Speed: 6.45
description.iron.man.mark.34: The Southpaw armor is the first of the Disaster Rescue armors, its design is quite similar to mark 14 and has a pincer that allows it to grab entities to carry them or throw them away Durability:24    Strength: 19    Flight Speed: 6.25
description.iron.man.mark.35: The Red Snapper armor is the second of the Disaster Rescue armors, its design retains the typical red with yellow and silver colors; It has dual pincers that allow it to grab entities to carry them or throw them away Durability:25    Strength: 20    Flight Speed: 6.25
description.iron.man.mark.36: The Peacemaker armor is the third of the Disaster Rescue armors, its design is the same as the Red Snapper armor with the difference of orange, silver and black colors; Like mark 15 sneaky it has sonic tranquilizers Durability:26    Strength: 21    Flight Speed: 6.15
description.iron.man.mark.37: The Hammerhead armor is the direct successor to mark 10, which had underwater breathing, it has an aquamarine design with gold and various underwater capabilities as well as an improvement to swim in a unique way and a repulsor shield Durability:27    Strength: 22    Flight Speed: 6.45
description.iron.man.mark.38: The Igor armor is a unique class armor, Capable of lifting heavy things like mobs and crushing them Durability:28    Strength: 23    Flight Speed: 6.05
description.iron.man.mark.39: Mark 39 Starboost is an armor designed for interplanetary travel (Only available with Ad astra) /Has flares/ Durability:46    Strength: 25    Flight Speed: 6.65
description.iron.man.mark.40: The Shotgun armor is the final version of speed-based models, having greater speed than other armors of this same type /Has flares/ Durability:28    Strength: 8    Flight Speed: 6.85
description.iron.man.mark.45: Armor made of strong gold alloy /Has flares/ Durability:35    Strength: 30    Flight Speed: 6.55
description.iron.man.mark.47: More resistant armor than mark 45 /Has flares/ Durability:37    Strength: 32    Flight Speed: 6.55
description.iron.man.superior.armor: An endosymbiotic armor, quite strong, capable of shooting energy beams to paralyze enemies (You need to craft a metallized symbiote to unlock it) Durability:65    Strength: 47    Flight Speed: 6.55
description.iron.man.mark.Iron.destroyer: A uru armor that has magical properties /Has luck, jump and water agility effects/ Durability:40    Strength: 38    Flight Speed: 6.55
description.iron.man.mark.unknow.blooded: Nanotechnology armor enchanted to fight vampires (slows down enemies with its plasma projectiles, plus can fast forward time, slow it down or stop it) Durability:45    Strength: 46    Flight Speed: 6.55
description.iron.man.mark.1873: An armor made of nanotechnology with steampunk appearance (With smoke abilities) Durability:43    Strength: 46    Flight Speed: 6.55
description.iron.man.mark.extremis: A nanotechnology armor made with the extremis virus Durability:68    Strength: 55    Flight Speed: 6.55
description.ark.upgrade.thing.1: By unlocking this the ark reactor will recharge itself and will not overcharge so as not to damage you
description.ark.upgrade.thing.2: By unlocking this the ark reactor will recharge itself and will not overcharge so as not to damage you when you are using the armor
description.iron.man.symbiote_metalized: A symbiote made of metal capable of enhancing your abilities.
description.flight: When you have some armor in place you will have the ability to fly
description.energy_beam: Launch an energy beam from your ark reactor
description.Energy.Pulse: By activating this the armor will be able to throw energy from the hands (with right or left click, when you click you can choose to use one or both)
description.superior.telekinesis: By using the ability you will be able to grab objects on the ground and enemies with your mind
description.superior.electrokinesis: Paralyze your enemies with a bolt of electricity
description.force_field: With the energy of your armor create a shield to block enemy attacks
description.superior.suit.expulsion: Ejects part of the suit to damage enemies
description.satsu.flight.edit: When activating this ability you can increase/decrease flight speed (You need to activate the armor edit ability)
description.satsu.failsafe.edit: When activating this ability you can enable/disable the armor's ability to save you when you are hurt (You need to activate the armor edit ability)
description.satsu.choose.armor: When activating this ability you can choose which armor to put on (You need to activate the armor edit ability)
description.satsu.arms.edit: When activating this ability you can choose extra weapons, such as rockets, swords and more (You need to activate the armor edit ability)
description.satsu.enable.sentinel: Having an included AI you can make your armor act by itself by removing it from you
description.satsu.disable.sentinel: When you have armor acting by itself you can put it back on
description.satsu.unlock.lock.ia.skill.t: By clicking on the ability you can deactivate the AI menu, so it interferes less
description.satsu.ia_tarjet: This empty card can be filled with an AI with different names, which will help you by having some extra improvements, such as warning you when you have low energy among others
description.satsu.unlock.lock.ia.gui: You can enable/disable this to see your AI on screen
description.satsu.ia.gui: It's just your AI's icon on screen
description.satsu.unlock.lock.ia.gui.ene: Having the AI now you can see exactly how much energy you have
description.satsu.unlock.lock.ia.scan.ab: If you have the abilities menu disabled you can enable/disable the scan ability
description.satsu.unlock.lock.ia.sentine: If you have the abilities menu disabled you can enable/disable the ability to use a sentinel armor
description.satsu.ia.choose: Activate this to move to the next or previous AI; each AI will treat you differently and have different interactions
description.satsu.ia.color: Each AI has a characteristic color
description.satsu.time.clock: Completely pause time, making enemies unable to move
description.satsu.accelerate.time: Accelerate time making you faster (Includes enemies)
description.satsu.ark_upgrades: This is an upgrade branch of your ark reactor
description.satsu.armor.branch: This is a branch of basic/passive armor abilities
description.satsu.ark.upgrade.max.energy: You can upgrade the ark reactor to have more energy (20000 maximum)
You can upgrade the ark reactor even further to have more energy (80000 maximum)
description.satsu.ia.scan.abilitie: This is part of the enemy scanning ability branch, you can unlock it to activate it
description.satsu.sentinel: This is part of the sentinel armor skill branch, you can unlock it to activate it (Only available for nanotechnological armor)
description.satsu.ark.beam.for.hands: You can toggle between energy pulses and a single ark beam, activated with the same button (right or left click) (you can toggle between seeing this button or configuring your armor by crouching)
description.satsu.voice.comands.ia: You can write your AI's name to ask it to perform certain actions, like using sentinel mode, displaying energy, scanning enemies or seeing in the dark
description.satsu.pickaxe.velocity: While wearing armor, your mining speed increases (Varies depending on the armor)
description.satsu.armor.edit: With this ability you can see the menu to choose armor, activate life insurance and perform other actions
description.satsu.handle: With right click you can remove your arc reactor from your chest
description.satsu.dampeneed: This damper is used to block abilities with the arc reactor
description.satsu.throw.smoke: Throws smoke to suffocate your enemies
description.satsu.clap_smoke_hands: Creates a smoke area to suffocate your enemies for 15 seconds
description.satsu.extremis.healing: Thanks to the extremis virus you are able to regenerate
description.satsu.extremis.durability: Thanks to the extremis virus you have an increase in resistance (10 points)
description.satsu.extremis.strength: Thanks to the extremis virus you have an increase in strength (8 points)
description.satsu.remove.ia: You can easily remove the AI by clicking on the ability, depending on the AI you have, it will give you a different card
description.satsu.remove.ia_glases: You can remove the glasses by clicking on the ability
description.satsu.remote.mode: With the AI glasses you can activate the remote mode to control your armor remotely. To activate, type remote on in the chat and to deactivate, remote off
description.satsu.dril.ground: Use the hammers to drill the ground for a limited time; This action will cause damage and break the blocks if you have this option active
description.satsu.dampened.sound: Use your sonic weaponry to pacify enemies (Slows them down, leaving them immobile)
description.satsu.flare.flame: Use the flares to blind opponents if it is a player, mobs will be immobilized for a while
description.satsu.increase.speed: Use this skill to increase flight speed
description.satsu.decrease.speed: Use this skill to decrease flight speed
description.satsu.color.change.mode: You can change the armor color by pressing the button or it will automatically change at night
description.satsu.throw.blades: You can activate or deactivate the vibranium daggers to do more damage or achieve an attack with them
description.satsu.throw.blades.attack: With the vibranium daggers perform an attack with which you can attack several enemies at once
description.satsu.pincher_left: You can easily grab entities with your left hand when close to them, you can also throw them with left click
description.satsu.pincher_right: You can easily grab entities with your right hand when close to them, you can also throw them with left click
description.satsu.pincher_both: You can easily grab entities with both hands when close to them, you can also throw them with left click
description.satsu.water.movement: This ability will be available underwater, allowing you to swim faster
description.satsu.igor_grab: You can grab entities or players with this ability, you can also throw them away
description.satsu.igor_crash: When you grab a player or entity, you can crush them (deals 45 damage)
description.flight.mark.1: Being your first armor you won't have the ability to fly completely
description.satsu.config_gui: You can configure the HUD view mode
description.satsu.ground.attack: With your hammers you can do a ground attack, break blocks and launch your enemies into the air
satsu.iron.man.addon.text.earned.points: You have earned an experience point for the armors
satsu.iron.man.addon.text.ia.interaction: <J.A.R.V.I.S> How may I serve you today sir?
<P.E.P.P.E.R> Hello, how can I assist you today?
<F.R.I.D.A.Y> Ready and waiting for your orders, boss
<E.D.I.T.H> Good morning all set to start, how can I assist you?
<K.A.R.E.N> Hello, how can I help today?
<K.A.T.I.E> Hi! I'm Katie, your digital assistant. How can I help you today?
<H.E.L.E.N> Hello, I'm Helen. How can I assist you today?
<T.A.D.A.S.H.I> Hi! How can I help you today?
<M.O.T.H.E.R B.O.A.R.D> Connection established. Ready to execute commands
<T.O.N.Y> What's up? I'm ready for whatever you need
<V.E.R.O.N.I.C.A> Veronica activated. What's the mission?
<U.L.T.R.O.N> Need something? Remember, order is my priority
<J.O.C.A.S.T.A> Jocasta operating system active. What do you need?
<J.A.R.V.I.S> Night vision activated, sir. You can now see in the dark
<P.E.P.P.E.R> Night vision activated. You can now see clearly in the dark
<F.R.I.D.A.Y> Night vision activated, boss. You now have clear vision in the dark
<E.D.I.T.H> Night vision activated. All set for operation in low-light environments
<K.A.R.E.N> Night vision activated. You can now see clearly
<K.A.T.I.E> Night vision activated. You can now see clearly in the dark
<H.E.L.E.N> Night vision activated. Ready to proceed in low-light conditions
<T.A.D.A.S.H.I> Night vision activated. I am ready to assist you in the dark
<M.O.T.H.E.R.B.O.A.R.D> Night vision activated. Systems optimized for low-light environments
<T.O.N.Y> Night vision activated. All set to operate in the dark
<V.E.R.O.N.I.C.A> Night vision activated. You now have clear vision in the dark
<U.L.T.R.O.N> Night vision activated. Ready to identify threats in the dark
<J.O.C.A.S.T.A> Night vision activated. You can now operate in low-light conditions
<J.A.R.V.I.S> Night vision deactivated, sir. Returning to standard vision
<P.E.P.P.E.R> Night vision deactivated. Returning to standard view
<F.R.I.D.A.Y> Night vision deactivated, boss. Back to normal vision
<E.D.I.T.H> Night vision deactivated. Optical systems in daytime mode
<K.A.R.E.N> Night vision deactivated. Back to normal view
<K.A.T.I.E> Night vision deactivated. Back to standard view
<H.E.L.E.N> Night vision deactivated. Proceeding with normal operations
<T.A.D.A.S.H.I> Night vision deactivated. You are now in normal mode
<M.O.T.H.E.R.B.O.A.R.D> Night vision deactivated. Systems optimized for daytime vision
<T.O.N.Y> Night vision deactivated. Back to normal view
<V.E.R.O.N.I.C.A> Night vision deactivated. Returning to standard mode
<U.L.T.R.O.N> Night vision deactivated. Returning to normal conditions
<J.O.C.A.S.T.A> Night vision deactivated. Operations in standard mode
<J.A.R.V.I.S> Scanning area for enemies, sir. Detection complete
<P.E.P.P.E.R> Enemy scan in progress. Hostiles detected nearby.
<F.R.I.D.A.Y> Enemy scan activated, boss.
<E.D.I.T.H> Scanning enemies in progress. Detection complete
<K.A.R.E.N> Scanning enemies. Hostiles detected near your location
<K.A.T.I.E> Scanning enemies. Detection complete.
<H.E.L.E.N> Enemy scan in progress. Identification complete. Hostiles nearby.
<T.A.D.A.S.H.I> Scan in progress. I have detected threats nearby.
<M.O.T.H.E.R.B.O.A.R.D> Enemy scan in progress. Detection complete.
<T.O.N.Y> Scanning enemies. Hostiles in the area. Prepare yourself
<V.E.R.O.N.I.C.A> Enemy scan completed. I have detected threats in the area.
<U.L.T.R.O.N> Enemy scan completed. Threats identified in the perimeter.
<J.O.C.A.S.T.A> Scanning enemies. Identification complete.
<J.A.R.V.I.S> Enemy scan deactivated, sir. Returning to standard mode.
<P.E.P.P.E.R> Enemy scan deactivated. Returning to normal mode.
<F.R.I.D.A.Y> Enemy scan deactivated, boss. Returning to standard mode.
<E.D.I.T.H> Enemy scan deactivated. Optical systems in normal mode.
<K.A.R.E.N> Enemy scan deactivated. Returning to normal mode.
<K.A.T.I.E> Enemy scan deactivated. Back to standard mode
<H.E.L.E.N> Enemy scan deactivated. Proceeding with normal operations.
<T.A.D.A.S.H.I> Enemy scan deactivated. You are now in normal mode.
<M.O.T.H.E.R.B.O.A.R.D> Enemy scan deactivated. Systems in standard mode.
<T.O.N.Y> Enemy scan deactivated. System normalized.
<V.E.R.O.N.I.C.A> Enemy scan deactivated. Now in standard mode.
<U.L.T.R.O.N> Enemy scan deactivated. Returning to normal conditions.
<J.O.C.A.S.T.A> Enemy scan deactivated. Returning to normal operations.
<J.A.R.V.I.S> Here are the current energy levels, sir. All systems are operating within optimal parameters.
<P.E.P.P.E.R> Displaying energy levels. All systems are functioning correctly
<F.R.I.D.A.Y> Displaying energy levels, boss.
<E.D.I.T.H> Displaying current energy levels.
<K.A.R.E.N> Displaying current energy levels. Everything is in order
<K.A.T.I.E> Displaying energy levels. Everything is functioning properly

<U.L.T.R.O.N> Displaying energy levels. Ready for any eventuality.
<J.O.C.A.S.T.A> Energy levels on screen.
<J.A.R.V.I.S> Energy levels hidden, sir. Back to standard view.
<P.E.P.P.E.R> Energy levels hidden. Everything back to standard view
<F.R.I.D.A.Y> Energy levels hidden, boss. Everything in normal mode.
<E.D.I.T.H> Energy levels hidden. Optical systems in normal mode.
<K.A.R.E.N> Energy levels hidden. Now you have normal view.
<K.A.T.I.E> Energy levels hidden. Back to normal view.
<H.E.L.E.N> Energy levels hidden. Proceeding with normal operations

<J.O.C.A.S.T.A> Energy levels hidden. Returning to normal operations.
<J.A.R.V.I.S> Sentinel mode activated, sir. Scanning and monitoring in progress.
<P.E.P.P.E.R> Sentinel mode activated. Constant monitoring and ready to act

satsu.iron.man.addon.text.ia.warning.ene: <J.A.R.V.I.S> Sir, energy is in a critical state. I recommend immediate recharge to prevent shutdown.
<P.E.P.P.E.R> Energy is at critical levels. We need to recharge to prevent shutdown.
<V.I.E.R.N.E.S> Boss, we are at critical energy levels. Recommendation: initiate immediate recharge
<E.D.I.T.H> Warning: critical energy levels. System shutting down shortly if not recharged
<K.A.R.E.N> Energy levels are in critical state. We need to recharge before it runs out
<K.A.T.I.E> Warning: energy levels in critical state. System will shut down if not recharged soon.
<H.E.L.E.N> Energy levels in critical state. Recommendation: initiate recharge to maintain operations.
<T.A.D.A.S.H.I> I inform that energy levels are in critical state. Recharge needed to continue operating.
<P.L.A.C.A M.A.D.R.E> Warning: energy in critical state. Systems will shut down if immediate recharge is not performed
<T.O.N.Y> Warning, energy at critical levels. Recharge needed to continue operating.
<V.E.R.O.N.I.C.A> Critical energy state. Immediate recharge required to prevent shutdown.
<U.L.T.R.O.N> Energy in critical state. Imminent shutdown unless recharged immediately
<J.O.C.A.S.T.A> Energy levels in critical state. System shutting down soon unless recharged
satsu.iron.man.addon.text.ia.interaction: <J.A.R.V.I.S> Deactivating, sir. Until next time.
<P.E.P.P.E.R> Deactivating. I'm here if you need anything else.
<F.R.I.D.A.Y> Deactivating, boss. Until next time.
<E.D.I.T.H> Deactivating. Always available when you need me.
<K.A.R.E.N> Deactivating. I'll be here when you need me
<K.A.T.I.E> Deactivating. Call me back when you need help
<H.E.L.E.N> Deactivating. Always available for future inquiries.
<T.A.D.A.S.H.I> Deactivating. I'll be ready to help you again.
<M.O.T.H.E.R.B.O.A.R.D> Deactivating. Systems on standby until the next command.
<T.O.N.Y> Deactivating. Call me when you need something
<V.E.R.O.N.I.C.A> Deactivating
<U.L.T.R.O.N> Deactivating. Until needed again.
<J.O.C.A.S.T.A> Deactivating. I'll be ready to assist when you need me
satsu.iron.man.addon.text.select_config_: Select GUI options: 1-First person only         2-Include third person         3-Disabled
description.ia_skill_stat: This is the skill tree that will allow you to unlock your various IA functions
advancements.satsu_iron_man_addon.reacto: Build an arc energy block on to charge if you need it
advancements.satsu_iron_man_addon.ia.tar: Build an AI card for better functionality in your armor
To put on mark 1 to 3 you need to create this block to put on the armor
advancements.satsu_iron_man_addon.more.d: You can unlock even more armor...
